## LinkFactory type

Link factory type

Link is DOM-only - no need for generic adapter abstraction

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type LinkFactory = ServiceDefinition<'Link', {
    (props: ElementProps<DOMAdapterConfig, 'a'> & {
        href: string;
    }): (...children: ElRefSpecChild[]) => RefSpec<HTMLAnchorElement>;
}>;
```
**References:** [ServiceDefinition](../../lattice/servicedefinition/)<!-- -->, [ElementProps](../../view/elementprops/)<!-- -->, [DOMAdapterConfig](../../view/domadapterconfig/)<!-- -->, [ElRefSpecChild](../../view/elrefspecchild/)<!-- -->, [RefSpec](../../view/refspec/)
